Home > external > metacyc > getEnzymesFromMetaCyc.m

getEnzymesFromMetaCyc

PURPOSE

getEnzymesFromMetaCyc

SYNOPSIS

function metaCycEnzymes=getEnzymesFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)

DESCRIPTION 

 getEnzymesFromMetaCyc
   Retrieves all enzymes and reaction-enzyme association information in MetaCyc

   metacycPath  if metaCycEnzymes.mat is not in the RAVEN\external\metacyc
                directory, this function will attempt to read data from a local
                dump of the MetaCyc database. metacycPath is the path to the
                root of this database

   model        a model structure generated from the database. The following
                fields are filled
                id:             'MetaCyc'
                description:    'Automatically generated from MetaCyc database'
                rxns:           Reaction id
                rxnNames:       Reaction name
                enzymes:        Enzyme id
                enzrxns:        Enzymatic-reaction id
                cplxs:          Enzyme complexes
                cplxComp:       Subunit components of enzyme complexes
                rxnEnzymeMat    A binary matrix that indicates association of a
                                specific enzyme to the reactions it catalyze

   If the file metaCycEnzymes.mat is in the RAVEN\external\metacyc directory
   it will be loaded. Otherwise, it will be generated by parsing the MetaCyc
   database files. In general, this metaCycEnzymes.mat file should be removed
   and rebuilt when a newer version of MetaCyc is released.

   Usage: model=getEnzymesFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)

   Hao Wang, 2017-06-17

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:
  • getModelFromMetaCyc getModelFromMetaCyc

0003 %   Retrieves all enzymes and reaction-enzyme association information in MetaCyc
0004 %

0026 %   and rebuilt when a newer version of MetaCyc is released.

0033 %NOTE: This is how one entry looks in the files
0034 
0035 %proteins.dat
0036 % UNIQUE-ID - MONOMER-8570
0037 % TYPES - Polypeptides
0038 % COMMON-NAME - D-carnitine dehydrogenase subunit
0039 % COMPONENT-OF - CPLX-5143
0040 % MOLECULAR-WEIGHT-EXP - 23
0041 % MOLECULAR-WEIGHT-KD - 23
0042 % SPECIES - ORG-6256
0043 % //
0044 
0045 %enzrxns.dat
0046 % UNIQUE-ID - ENZRXN-14974
0047 % TYPES - Enzymatic-Reactions
0048 % COMMON-NAME - (1S,4R)-iso-dihydrocarvone monooxygenase
0049 % BASIS-FOR-ASSIGNMENT - :MANUAL
0050 % CITATIONS - 10769172:EV-EXP-IDA-PURIFIED-PROTEIN:3419689584:caspi
0051 % COFACTORS - FAD
0052 % ENZYME - MONOMER-13964
0053 % PHYSIOLOGICALLY-RELEVANT? - T
0054 % REACTION - RXN-9435
0055 % REGULATED-BY - REG-12241
0056 % REGULATED-BY - REG-12240
0057 % TEMPERATURE-OPT - 35
0058 
0059 % A line that contains only '//' separates each object.
0060 
0061 %Check if the enzymatic proteins have been parsed before and saved. If so,
0062 %load the model.
0063 [ST, I]=dbstack('-completenames');
0064 ravenPath=fileparts(fileparts(fileparts(ST(I).file)));
0065 enzymesFile=fullfile(ravenPath,'external','metacyc','metaCycEnzymes.mat');
0066 metaCycProteinFile='proteins.dat';
0067 metaCycEnzrxnsFile='enzrxns.dat';
0068 
0069 if exist(enzymesFile, 'file')
0070     fprintf(['NOTE: Importing MetaCyc enzymes and reaction-enzyme association from ' strrep(enzymesFile,'\','/') '.\n']);
0071     load(enzymesFile);
0072 else
0073     fprintf(['Cannot locate ' strrep(genesFile,'\','/') ' and will try to generate it from the local MetaCyc database files.\n']);
0074     if ~exist(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycProteinFile),'file') || ~exist(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycEnzrxnsFile),'file')
0075         EM=fprintf(['The files of enzymes or proteins cannot be located, and should be downloaded from MetaCyc.\n']);
0076         dispEM(EM);
0077     else
0078         metaCycEnzymes.id='MetaCyc';
0079         metaCycEnzymes.description='Automatically generated from MetaCyc database';
0080         
0081         %Reserve space for 10000 enzyme complexs
0082         metaCycEnzymes.cplxs=cell(10000,1);
0083         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp=cell(10000,1);
0084         metaCycEnzymes.enzymes=cell(50000,1);
0085         
0086         %Get the information of protein complexes and their components
0087         nCplx=0;
0088         enzymeCounter=0;
0089         
0090         fid = fopen(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycProteinFile), 'r');
0091         %Loop through the file
0092         while 1
0093             tline = fgetl(fid);
0094             
0095             %Abort at end of file
0096             if ~ischar(tline)
0097                 break;
0098             end
0099             
0100             %Add Enzyme id
0101             if numel(tline)>12 && strcmp(tline(1:12),'UNIQUE-ID - ')
0102                 enzymeCounter=enzymeCounter+1;
0103                 addMe=false;
0104                 enzymeID=tline(13:end);
0105                 metaCycEnzymes.enzymes{enzymeCounter}=enzymeID;
0106             end
0107             
0108             %Check if enzyme complexes
0109             if strcmp(tline(1:end),'TYPES - Protein-Complexes')
0110                 nCplx=nCplx+1;
0111                 nComp=0;
0112                 
0113                 %Reserve 100 subunits for each enzyme complex
0114                 Comp.subunit=cell(100,1);
0115                 metaCycEnzymes.cplxs{nCplx}=enzymeID;
0116                 
0117                 addMe=true;
0118             end
0119             
0120             if numel(tline)>13 && strcmp(tline(1:13),'COMPONENTS - ')
0121                 nComp=nComp+1;
0122                 Comp.subunit{nComp}=tline(14:end);
0123             end
0124             
0125             if strcmp(tline(1:end),'//')
0126                 if addMe
0127                     Comp.subunit=Comp.subunit(1:nComp);
0128                     metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{nCplx}=Comp;
0129                 end
0130                 addMe=false;
0131             end
0132         end
0133         %Close the file
0134         fclose(fid);
0135         
0136         %If too much space was allocated, shrink the model
0137         metaCycEnzymes.cplxs=metaCycEnzymes.cplxs(1:nCplx);
0138         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp=metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp(1:nCplx);
0139         metaCycEnzymes.enzymes=metaCycEnzymes.enzymes(1:enzymeCounter);
0140         
0141         % Iteratively replace all components of complexes into polypeptide
0142         % subunits
0143         for i=1:numel(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp)
0144             checkCplx=true;
0145             while checkCplx
0146                 x=0;
0147                 mat=[]; %Matrix for component of protein-complexs
0148                 for j=1:numel(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit)
0149                     [a, b]=ismember(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit{j},metaCycEnzymes.cplxs);
0150                     if a
0151                         x=x+1;   %record this value j, and the cplx id b
0152                         mat(x,:)=[j b];
0153                     end
0154                 end
0155                 
0156                 if isempty(mat)
0157                     checkCplx=false; % No complexs found among components
0158                 else
0159                     %go through matrix JB
0160                     for k=1:x
0161                         %disp(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit{mat(k,1)});
0162                         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit(mat(k,1))=[];
0163                         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit=[metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit; metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{mat(k,2)}.subunit];
0164                     end
0165                 end
0166                 
0167             end
0168         end
0169         
0170         %Preallocate space for 500000 enzymatic reactions
0171         metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns=cell(50000,1);
0172         metaCycEnzymes.rxns=cell(50000,1);
0173         metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames=cell(50000,1);
0174         metaCycEnzymes.commoname=cell(50000,1);
0175         %metaCycEnzymes.enzymes=cell(50000,1);
0176         metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat=sparse(50000,enzymeCounter); % row: rxn, column: enzymes
0177         
0178         %Load enzyme and reaction association information
0179         fid = fopen(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycEnzrxnsFile), 'r');
0180         
0181         %Keeps track of how many enzymes and reactions have been added
0182         enzrxnCounter=0;
0183         nRxn=0;
0184         
0185         %These contain the mapping between Reactions and Enzymes Loop
0186         %through the file
0187         while 1
0188             tline = fgetl(fid);
0189             
0190             %Abort at end of file
0191             if ~ischar(tline)
0192                 break;
0193             end
0194             
0195             %Check if it is a new enzymatic reaction
0196             if numel(tline)>12 && strcmp(tline(1:12),'UNIQUE-ID - ')
0197                 enzrxnCounter=enzrxnCounter+1;
0198                 metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns{enzrxnCounter}=tline(13:end);
0199                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}='';
0200             end
0201             
0202             %Add common name of enzymatic reactions
0203             if numel(tline)>14 && strcmp(tline(1:14),'COMMON-NAME - ')
0204                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=tline(15:end);
0205                 
0206                 %Remove HTML symobls
0207                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=regexprep(metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter},'<(\w+)>','');
0208                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=regexprep(metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter},'</(\w+)>','');
0209                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=regexprep(metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter},'[&;]','');
0210             end
0211             
0212             % I add one cell array rxns for checking existing ones by
0213             % ismember because I cannot manage field rxns in this function
0214             
0215             %Add enzyme name
0216             if numel(tline)>9 && strcmp(tline(1:9),'ENZYME - ')
0217                 
0218                 %Save the index in enzymes field to nEnzyme
0219                 [x, nEnzyme]=ismember(tline(10:end),metaCycEnzymes.enzymes);
0220                 if ~x
0221                     %disp(tline(10:end));
0222                 end
0223             end
0224             
0225             %Add reaction id, and rxnNames by concatenating unique common
0226             %names
0227             if numel(tline)>11 && strcmp(tline(1:11),'REACTION - ')
0228                 nRxn=nRxn+1;
0229                 rxns{nRxn}='';
0230                 rxnID=tline(12:end);
0231                 [c, d]=ismember(rxnID,rxns);
0232                 if c
0233                     nRxn=nRxn-1;
0234                     
0235                     %Check if this common name has been included by
0236                     %rxnNames
0237                     k=strfind(metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{d},metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter});
0238                     if isempty(k)
0239                         metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{d}=strcat(metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{d},';',metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter});
0240                     end
0241                     metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat(d,nEnzyme)=1;
0242                 else
0243                     metaCycEnzymes.rxns{nRxn}=rxnID;
0244                     metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{nRxn}=metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter};
0245                     rxns{nRxn}=rxnID;
0246                     metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat(nRxn,nEnzyme)=1;
0247                 end
0248             end
0249             
0250         end
0251         
0252         %Close the file
0253         fclose(fid);
0254         
0255         %Shrink the sizes
0256         metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns=metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns(1:enzrxnCounter);
0257         metaCycEnzymes.commoname=metaCycEnzymes.commoname(1:enzrxnCounter);
0258         metaCycEnzymes.rxns=metaCycEnzymes.rxns(1:nRxn);
0259         metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames=metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames(1:nRxn);
0260         metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat=metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat(1:nRxn,:);
0261         
0262         %Save the model structure
0263         save(enzymesFile,'metaCycEnzymes');
0264     end
0265     
0266 end
0267 end
